title: After Brushing Face At The Apocalypse’s Boss For 363 Days - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai
tags: Apocalypse   Artificial Intelligence   Awkward Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Comedic Undertone   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Magic   Magic Beasts   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Scientists   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Tsundere   Zombies
author: Da Yuan Zi   大圆子
description:
In the most popular 3D keyboard online game “Tomorrow”, an ordinary player, Zhang Zhiyin had a less common hobby–that is to visit Dr. Y, the ultimate boss – giving him gifts and hugs.

As a game-produced NPC, the other side had, naturally, no response, but Zhang Zhiyin still insisted on visiting him rain or shine for 363 days. Until, one day, he decided to give up the game as a result of being hit by a car.

Since then, he had been dreaming every night in which he would cross into the realistic world of “Tomorrow” and return to the magical journey of normal life during the day.

****

“From the moment he had fallen in love with this person, he had chosen insanity.”>
